title: Hilary Duff Kisses Boyfriend Matthew Koma During Tropical Getaway -- See the PDA Pic!

persons.name: hilary duff kisses boyfriend matthew koma

text:
Hilary Duff Kisses Boyfriend Matthew Koma During Tropical Getaway -- See the PDA Pic! by Jennifer Drysdale 1:56   Getty Images Hilary Duff and Matthew Koma are Instagram official! The 29-year-old actress got steamy with her new beau for their first Instagram snap together, posted on Thursday. 
Duff and Koma, who have been vacationing in Costa Rica, lean in for a kiss while touring a tropical jungle. 
"üåøüå≥üêçü¶ãüêíüêúü¶éüåä," she captioned the pic. A post shared by Hilary Duff (@hilaryduff) on Feb 16, 2017 at 7:55pm PST RELATED: Hilary Duff Makes Red Carpet Debut With New Boyfriend Matthew Koma The pair was first linked in January, just one month after the former Disney star split with trainer Jason Walsh. In a recent interview with Cosmopolitan , Duff revealed that she had been dating Walsh for a lot longer than their five months in the public eye, and that is was "serious." "We were seeing each other for a while," Duff told the magazine. "People don't know the ins and outs of everything. It was definitely my first more serious relationship since my ex-husband [Mike Comrie]." "I was like, 'F**k it. He's my boyfriend,'" she said about her decision to go public. "I just needed to make sure it was right. People don't need to know my business until I really know my business, you know?" See more in the video below.
